summary: Requiring the filing of a declaration of intent prior t othe conduct by bona fide charitable or non-profit organizations of those bingo, raffle and amusement games exempted from the criminal penalties of state law by Chapter 280, Laws of 1971, 1st Extraordinary Session, and superseding Sections 22, 23, 24, 25 & 26 of Ordinance 16046 to the extent in conflict.
